verses.text: 因此，我勸你最重要的是要為萬人、君王和一切有權位的懇求、禱告、代求和感恩，好讓我們可以敬虔莊重地過平靜安穩的日子。

words.definition: so that, in order to allow

verses.text: 在我們的救主 神看來，這是美好的，可蒙悅納的。

words.note: The preceding space (U+3000) is a common typesetting convention in Chinese Bibles to elevate the name of God.
Often used in religious contexts to mean 'to receive (grace, favor)'.

verses.text: 他願意萬人得救，並且充分認識真理。
因為 神只有一位，在 神和人中間也只有一位中保，就是降世為人的基督耶穌。

words.note: The preceding space (U+3000) is a common typesetting convention in Chinese Bibles to elevate the name of God.
The preceding space (U+3000) is a common typesetting convention in Chinese Bibles to elevate the name of God.
Literally 'middle protector' or 'one who protects from the middle'.

words.definition: to come into the world, incarnate

verses.text: 他捨了自己作萬人的贖價，到了適當的時候，這事就證實了。
為了這事，我也被派作傳道的和使徒，在信仰和真理上作外族人的教師。

words.note: Verb-object compound: to transmit the Way/truth
Here means 'one who is' or 'those who are'
Lit. 'sent follower'
Indicates scope or aspect
Lit. 'outside race people'

verses.text: 敬畏 神的女人因此，我願意男人沒有忿怒，沒有爭論，舉起聖潔的手隨處禱告。

words.note: Verb-object compound: to report in prayer

verses.text: 照樣，我也願意女人以端正、嫻淑、自律為裝飾；不要以鬈髮、金飾、珠寶，或名貴衣裳為裝飾，

words.note: Refers to elaborately styled or braided hair, not just curly hair.
A more literary term for clothing

verses.heading: Conduct of Women

verses.text: 卻要以善行作裝飾，這才配稱為敬畏 神的女人。

words.note: Often used in the context of revering God.
The preceding space in '　神' is a reverence marker.

verses.text: 女人應該安靜而又完全順服地學習。

words.note: Used with '而' to connect two adverbial descriptions.

verses.text: 我不准女人教導，或轄制男人；女人總要安靜。

words.note: Often implies strong, authoritative control.

verses.text: 因為先造的是亞當，後造的是夏娃；
不是亞當受了引誘，而是女人受了引誘，陷在過犯裡面。

words.note: 不是 (bùshì) together means 'it is not that...'
Can also be a noun: 'temptation'.
而是 (érshì) together means 'but rather it is...'
Specifically refers to sin or trespass in religious context.

verses.text: 然而女人要是常常存著信心、愛心、聖潔自律，在她生育的事上必定得救。

words.note: Implies holding onto a state or quality.
A core theological concept.
A core theological concept.
Often used as a postposition indicating 'in the matter of'.
A key theological term for salvation.
